definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
unexpectedly/actually/to go so far as to/indeed
within the borders/internal (to a country, province, city etc)/domestic
to leave a country or region/outbound (tourism)
environmental sanitation/abbr. to 環衛|环卫[huan2 wei4]
to pass through a country's territory/transit

sentences.english: Here are a bunch of models from Uncharted that I worked on.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一個模型，我的祕境工作的一羣。

sentences.english: For the rest of us, though, South Island is the world's best-kept secret.
sentences.chinese: 但是對我們其餘的人而言，南島是世界最棒的祕境。

sentences.english: Between this Jing Yujing distance also is we studies hard the place.
sentences.chinese: 這“景”與“境”之間的距離也便是我們的用功之處。

sentences.english: I've divined the mysteries of death, and seen its truth.
sentences.chinese: 我已經參透了死亡的祕境，並且看到了它的實質。

sentences.english: To the late Tang and Five Dynasties, Zhouqu Tibetan sphere of influence is still habitat.
sentences.chinese: 唐末至五代，舟曲境仍在吐蕃勢力範圍。

sentences.english: The mystic territory of Wang Yiqiong is called Still Garden.
sentences.chinese: 王軼瓊的祕境名字叫靜園。

sentences.english: Environmental pollution is one of the most serious problems facing mankind today.
sentences.chinese: 境污染是當今人們所面對的一個非常嚴重的問題。

sentences.english: Once again, the Buddha, "We are what we think.
sentences.chinese: 再一次引用佛的話，“境隨心轉。

sentences.english: County is a remote Fam, a treasure-house full of magic.
sentences.chinese: 文縣是一處偏僻祕境，一塊充滿神奇的寶地。

sentences.english: Though Zhang Dong's family is wealthy, he is usually simply dressed.
sentences.chinese: 儘管張東家境比較富裕，但穿着卻十分樸素。

sentences.english: When you first dive down to inspect them, though, it will appear as though you are shrouded in fog.
sentences.chinese: 當你首次潛入祕境探尋的時候，好似身陷迷霧。

sentences.english: For the rest of us, though, South Island is the world's best-kept secret.
sentences.chinese: 但是對我們其餘的人而言，南島是世上最棒的祕境。

sentences.english: Rich as his family is, Zhangdong always wares simple clothes.
sentences.chinese: 儘管張東家境比較富裕，但是他的穿着卻十分樸素。

sentences.english: There's still a lot more wasteland out there that has yet to be explored.
sentences.chinese: 浩劫後的世界裏，有許多荒野祕境等你來探索。

definition: Mahayana, the Great Vehicle/Buddhism based on the Mayahana sutras, as spread to Central Asia, China and beyond/also pr. [Da4 cheng2]
to enter the Way/to become a Daoist
honored sir (a person of higher status or seniority, or a Buddhist monk)
the most honorable/the most respected/supreme/(archaic) the emperor
